resources.string: Congrats! You entered the correct word for the prompt :)
Sorry, the word you chose is not relevant to the prompt :(

Keep the baby happy, its happiness is your score! 

 Kiss = Tap 

 Tickle = Tap left and right repeatedly 

 Rub the baby = Slide back and fourth vertically / horizontally
In this game you will be giving a speech to the public given a topic. What you need to do is to select the related word from the four possible choices and type it as an input

In this game you are sorting out the policies of your party. As the campaign leader, you decide what your party should fight for. However, the general populace will not always be happy with what you decide on, so use your judgement to decide what may be best for the country.
Invalid Password.We expected you to enter more than 4 characters for password
Invalid Username or email.Please make sure it is not empty or matches email format.
User name already exists,please select another user name
Unable to connect to the database.Registration Failed
User Not Found in the database. Please register!
Congratulations! You have made reasonable choices with the given proposals. Your charisma made you one of the most popular candidates in this election.
Unfortunately, you underwhelming performance during this stage made you rated as one of the worst candidates in this election
this is the summary for all 3 game scores
campaign with the best interests of
donate money to charities that work with
gift a bouquet of flowers to
send a police squad to detain and imprison
Gandhi, a recently popular peace advocate who campaigns in India
the popular late-night TV show host John Olive Oil
Bill Rye, a once popular figure in science who recently published a paper on the benefits of foot rubs
Toe-Knee, a rising star in the genre of Jazz, who recently released his hit album "CS Blues"
Jacki, a citizen who has been wrongfully imprisoned in the country of Canada for not holding the door for the boy behind him
the leader of North Coreeah, who is planning a nuclear strike
Colin, a medical practitioner found to have cheated on his medical exams after a related illegal nose smuggling ring was busted
Kavin, a phantom thief who masterminded the theft all the laptop chargers, but not the laptops, at the University of Toronto last Fall
puppies, specifically the ones at the Downtown Toronto Dog Shelter
Boundless Peacocks, the very last of their species
sad computer science students at the University of Toronto
seal clubbers, who have hunted and killed countless baby seals
thieves, who have stolen goods from innocent students
Good afternoon, based on our campaign researchers\' speculation, would you like to
This just in, based on the rumors from our excited supporters, is it true that you would
Greetings, based on the meeting result last week, are you going to
Nice to meet you. I am one of your many campaign assistants and was wondering if you would like to
The country needs more budget to spend on improving public education and there is discussion for raising the money
Many young people in the country are struggling to pay back student loans and there is discussion for the government to relieve this debt
Climate change is rising threat to the planet and there is discussion to expand on the country\'s renewable energy sources
The homelessness rate in the country is rising each year and there is discussion to introduce a universal basic income
Surveys show that many citizens do not like their governors on the provincial and municipal level and there is discussion to introduce a term limit"
A recent trend shows that many corporations are outsourcing jobs to other parts of the world and there is discussion so keep jobs domestic
Genetically modified foods is a controversial topic and there is discussion to heavily regulate them or ban them
New strains of diseases are on the rise and there is discussion for the government to introduce mandatory vaccinations
Studies have shown that a 4 day work week increases productivity and there is discussion for this change to be implemented
Older citizens are struggling to retire at reasonable age and there is discussion to increase senior assissance
